mapper.sql: ID, FAMILY_NUMBER, FAMILY_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANGE_REASON, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, MANAGER_EMAIL, INVOICE_TYPE, BUSINESS_LICENSE_IMAGE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, OTHER_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into t_business_change (FAMILY_NUMBER, FAMILY_NAME, ADDRESS, CHANGE_REASON, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, MANAGER_EMAIL, INVOICE_TYPE, BUSINESS_LICENSE_IMAGE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, OTHER_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG) values (#{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicenseImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresenIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)
mapper.select: select FAMILY_NUMBER,FAMILY_NAME,CHANGE_REASON,ID_CARD from t_business_change where ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
